attributes.additional_details:
The sharing of 18+ inappropriate, sometimes illegal, content on Facebook is being shared on everyone's facebook news feeds.

Here are only a few examples of what horrific videos have been uploaded to Facebook:

- A grown lady being masturbated by a living fish
- A grown lady having sexual intercourse with a Labrador
- A young boy having sexual intercourse with a goat
- A young girl masturbating
- A woman's head being cut off

This is disgusting content and unacceptable that it shows up on our news feeds every time someone likes, comments, or shares this content. We this a very serious issue and we want tighter regulation on content that is shown on Facebook! We want Facebook to review EVERY video before it is uploaded to the internet.

Sign this petition to show your support against this issue. This must STOP NOW!
